intro: Zenrock zenBTC is a Bitcoin-backed token on Solana leveraging institutional custody infrastructure. The token operates with centralized mint and update authorities managed by Zenrock's custodial framework.

risk_factors: Has mint authority - tokens can be minted

authority_analyses.mint_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='1119qkNL2yrzq7tExQBCej8nLZNM4P82E85q2o8SHhL', authority_type='Non-existent', capabilities=['Address does not exist'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Invalid authority address'})
authority_analyses.update_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='4m3vcaUQc5jx9xUBHERYCRvvbk5oUzmuKLej42639PSH', authority_type='Wallet', capabilities=['Full unilateral control (no multi-party approval required)'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Single wallet control - centralized authority', 'mitigations': []})

recommendations: Consider decentralizing mint_authority - current setup is high risk
Consider decentralizing update_authority - current setup is high risk
